query.description: Maximum number of concurrent executions if there are many query variables. Zero means unlimited.

mutation.description: Maximum number of concurrent executions if there are many mutation operations. Zero means unlimited.

rest.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to remote servers (distribution mode). Zero means unlimited.

ConcurrencySettings.description: ConcurrencySettings represent settings for concurrent webhook executions to remote servers.

file.description: File path needs to be converted

spec.description: The API specification of the file, is one of oas3 (openapi3), oas2 (openapi2)

methodAlias.description: Alias names for HTTP method. Used for prefix renaming, e.g. getUsers, postUser

prefix.description: Add a prefix to the function and procedure names

trimPrefix.description: Trim the prefix in URL, e.g. /v1

envPrefix.description: The environment variable prefix for security values, e.g. PET_STORE

pure.description: Return the pure NDC schema only

patchBefore.description: Patch files to be applied into the input file before converting

patchAfter.description: Patch files to be applied into the input file after converting

allowedContentTypes.description: Allowed content types. All content types are allowed by default

output.description: The location where the ndc schema file will be generated. Print to stdout if not set

timeout.description: configure the request timeout in seconds.

ConfigItem.description: ConfigItem extends the ConvertConfig with advanced options

Configuration.description: Configuration contains required settings for the connector.

argumentField.description: The argument field name to be added for headers forwarding.

oneOf.description: HTTP response headers to be forwarded from a data connector to the client.

ForwardHeadersSettings.description: ForwardHeadersSettings hold settings of header forwarding from and to Hasura engine

headersField.description: Name of the field in the NDC function/procedure's result which contains the response headers.

resultField.description: Name of the field in the NDC function/procedure's result which contains the result.

forwardHeaders.description: List of actual HTTP response headers from the data connector to be set as response headers. Returns all headers if empty.

ForwardResponseHeadersSettings.description: ForwardHeadersSettings hold settings of header forwarding from http response to Hasura engine.

httpStatus.description: HTTPStatus retries if the remote service returns one of these http status
